resources.string: As game start, you will see the line scrolling upwards. As long as you don\'t touch the screen line will become thinner and thinner and at some point you\'ll loose that line and game will be over! So if you\'re not cruel and at least a little care about line lifetime, you need to keep the line thick by touching it with your fingers! But be ware: with time line will scroll faster and perform more dangerous turns! Also, you\'ll notice, that line parts can be differently colored, check rules section below to learn all about line colors!
Main color of the line. Line just as is!
Another anti-bonus color. Only one tap on the part of the line colored like this will cause line death!
That is the color of parts of the line, which you successively cought with your finger!
If you touch part of the line colored like this, line become insensitive a little… It\'s getting harder to make it thicker.
But that is the bonus which increase the speed with that your line becomes thicker. Make it thicker quicker!
Unfortunately your favourite line can gone sometimes for a while…It happens if you tap on part of the line with that color.
Tap on that kind of the line will let you not worrying abount catching the line, tap anythere, but for a while.
